attributes.action: to look at the way payments are made to parents wether married or not. For the extra children they have whilst claiming benefits already. They should be informed when they first go onto benefits that extra children produced whilst on benefits will not give them an automatic increase to their benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is only fair to people who do work because a person working cant go to their employer and ask for a rise for each child they have. Working people have to buget how many children they can afford so why not people on benefits
